21 template <typename T,
22  typename std::enable_if<std::is_unsigned<T>::value && !std::is_same<T, bool>::value, int>::type = 0>
23 const char* convertIntToString(char buffer[24], T value, bool isNegative)
24 {
25  static const char DIGITS[] = "0001020304050607080910111213141516171819"
26  "2021222324252627282930313233343536373839"
27  "4041424344454647484950515253545556575859"
28  "6061626364656667686970717273747576777879"
29  "8081828384858687888990919293949596979899";
30 
31  static const size_t BUFFER_SIZE = 24;
32  char* bufferEnd = buffer + BUFFER_SIZE;
33 
34  *--bufferEnd = 0; // always terminate with '\0'
35 
36  while (value >= 100)
37  {
38  const unsigned int index = static_cast<unsigned int>((value % 100) * 2);
39  value /= 100;
40  *--bufferEnd = DIGITS[index + 1];
41  *--bufferEnd = DIGITS[index];
42  }
43 
44  if (value < 10)
45  {
46  *--bufferEnd = static_cast<char>('0' + value);
47  }
48  else
49  {
50  const unsigned int index = static_cast<unsigned int>(value * 2);
51  *--bufferEnd = DIGITS[index + 1];
52  *--bufferEnd = DIGITS[index];
53  }
54 
55  if (isNegative)
56  *--bufferEnd = '-';
57 
58  return bufferEnd;
59 }
60 
61 } // namespace detail
62 
72 template <typename T,
73  typename std::enable_if<std::is_unsigned<T>::value, int>::type = 0>
74 const char* convertIntToString(char buffer[24], T value)
75 {
76  return detail::convertIntToString(buffer, value, false);
77 }
78 
88 template <typename T, typename std::enable_if<std::is_signed<T>::value, int>::type = 0>
89 const char* convertIntToString(char buffer[24], T value)
90 {
91  using unsigned_type = typename std::make_unsigned<T>::type;
92  unsigned_type absValue = static_cast<unsigned_type>(value);
93  const bool isNegative = value < 0;
94  if (isNegative)
95  absValue = 0 - absValue;
96 
97  return detail::convertIntToString(buffer, absValue, isNegative);
98 }
99 
108 template <typename ALLOC, typename T>
109 zserio::string<zserio::RebindAlloc<ALLOC, char>> toString(T value, const ALLOC& allocator = ALLOC())
110 {
111  char buffer[24];
112  return zserio::string<zserio::RebindAlloc<ALLOC, char>>(convertIntToString(buffer, value), allocator);
113 }
